Title: Requires electronic benefit transfer systems to include automatic credit or debit card cancellation when fraudulent activity has been reported
Summary: Requires electronic benefit transfer systems to include automatic credit or debit card cancellation when fraudulent activity has been reported; directs that such cancellation shall occur as soon as the procedure for reporting fraudulent activity has been completed.
LawCode: Amd ยง21-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring electronic benefit transfer systems to include automatic credit or debit card cancellation when fraudulent activity has been reported
